lines.text: She's going to get everything. That's the way these old guys are. Tough as nails, biggest son of a bitch in the world, she touches his shriveled-up little noodle, and his brains turn to frozen yogurt. She'll marry him, screw him six feet into the ground and then get everything!
You think I'm bonking the old gent, don't you?
Yeah, we do.
Let me tell you something, handsome. If I were having sex with your Uncle Joe, he'd be dead by now.
A young girl with a body like that.When she's through with him they'll be nothing left but a smile and an old hat.
[to Uncle Joe's British "nanny," Molly]
I didn't like the Beatles and I don't like you!
[opening the door to find Danny nude]
Daniel McTeague?
No shit! That's my name too.
No, I'm a private investigator.
You're a detective? Great help me find my pants.
Okay, Joe. Bare knuckles, toe to toe. We've spent 20 years eating your shit and saying, "Mmm, delicious! What a cook!" - no more!
You say one more word and I'll kick your ass so high up you'll have to take off your shirt to shit!
What's the matter with you? Are you retarded?
Not according to the tests.
Monday nights I go to this newsstand to get the new TV Guide for Joe. He likes to get it as early as possible so he can circle everything he wants to watch.
Does he circle your ass?
[to Frank]
I'm no more a nurse than you are a human being.
Danny, I love you and I believe in you. But isn't everything you're telling me a big crock of bubbling shit?
I had no idea just how sick you guys were.
Come spend a day with us.
I'd rather shove this club up my ass.
I'll do it for you.
I'm insane? For five years I begged you, "Let's put him in a home!" No, you didn't want to because you didn't have the balls! None of you have any balls!

[Looking at photos of Mollie]
Do you have any where she's leaning over a saddle looking coy?
Where's my special boy?Where's Uncle Joe's special boy?.
Here I am Uncle Joe.
Carl get in touch with reality.

[referring to his doctor laid dead]
He used to brag to me how he got up every morning at five am to play racketball at 71 years old.You don't hear him bragging now.
You're not broke are you Uncle Joe?
I'm richer than shit.
[Daniel, angry, throws a bowling ball out a window]
You hit a car! You could've killed somebody!
The way I bowl...
We were all decent people before Uncle Joe sunk his hooks into us. Except for Frank. He was always a son of a bitch.
You made my life a living hell!
Kiss my ass!
That could take all night!
So you're interested in money, huh?
Aha. Made ten bucks just coming here.
[Uncle Joe frowns]
I get another twenty if I kiss ya.
[pause]
I'm thinkin' about it.
I'm sure this may come as a shock.
No, shitting a sailboat is a shock, this is a fucking catastrophe!
You can go dance the hully gully for all I care!
Oh, my God, I feel so horrible, I could cut out my tongue.
Here's a knife.
Stop it! Don't you see what's happening here?
Yeah, you're out of scotch.
Oh, Tina, go lie down.
Oh, great. Now I'm impotent.
We just kissed for two seconds?
No, it never takes me this long. Usually we're showering by now!
Where are my presents? I like presents, especially from people who love me.
And who would that be?
I mean look at this. Her tongue is practically in his wallet.
Yes, we have girls. We're not so cold-blooded enough to put Ed's sperm in a centrifuge and spin 'em around to separate the X's from the Y's.
Why don't we all agree to stop here.Let this bimbo have his money.I mean isn't our self respect worth more than any inheritance?
No.
You missed the basket while you was on the guy with the painted face.People hate that.
Wait a minute.Who's directing this you or me?Let me check.
[Looks down at chair]
That's my ass.That's my ass in the director's chair.Shit.I must be the director!
Do we know if they're sleeping together.Is there proof?
I need more time.
They're humping too quick to get pictures.Let's get a better detective!

[Referring to Danny]
He double crossed us.

[to his dad]
Because they're scum.I mean they're greedy.
We're greedy.We were willing to share!

[Uncle Joe gets in elevator]
Why don't we just cut the cable?
Sssshhhhh.
It's too thick.

[On hearing Joe's broke]
Dammit!Stupid.Stupid.We played along.We should have stepped in five years ago!
Two would have been enough.
You bastard!
I like it better when she says it.I think it's the accent or something.
Your Uncle had some congestion,he was coughing most of the night sir.
What kind of cough? Was it dry or liquidy?
It was just a cough sir.Next time I'll save you a sample.
Carl I want a girl,honey.
OK after he's dead we'll have a girl I promise.
Look money's money.I need it just like everybody else.But money's not gonna turn me into some sycophantic,arse licking wacko.

[drunk]
Happy birthday Uncle Joe!
That was last week.
Look at these pictures she got of Glen and that gym instructor.

[grabs photographs]
That's not me.
Well it looks like you and that's all that matters.

[been lowered into a pool by a crane]
I feel like a goddamn teabag!
You hired an actor to pretend he was me.And then pretended to get in a fight with him.And told him you preferred Uncle Joe to me.
Well when you put it like that it sounds kinda bad.
How the hell do you lose twenty five million dollars?
It's easier than you think.

[Joe follows Mollie to have sex]
May I ask you for a reference before you go upstairs sir?

[challenging Daniel]
C'mon out here in the deep end,show that girlfriend of yours what you're made of.
Oh definitely.I'm gonna beat up an elderly crippled man,and she's gonna say "my what a catch".
As soon as he gets back from work today,I'll give him a right good one.
These pills only work if I give them to him myself.It's a very rare condition.
Excuse me sir,does this say moron?
Ok I'll be honest with you I'm his nephew.
Oh his nephew?
Yes.
Because he specifically said that his room number wasn't to be given to any of his relatives.
What the hell's the matter with you.Do you not care about this hotel's reputation?You know there is an old man shacked up here with a very young girl.
Sir most of these rooms have old men with young girls this is Washington.
You tell your cousins I'm not afraid of them.And you leave Joe alone.
You keep your breasts off his eyebrows.
Carl... Carl, what happened? Is he...?
Massive coronary. He died instantly.
Really? You mean just...?
And he left everything to you, sis.
Really?
No, it wasn't even him. It was Dr. Hemmel.
You son of a bitch.
Ooh, you really wish it was the old man in the ambulance, don't you?
I did before, but now I wish it was you.
How are your girls, Ed?

That's right, we have girls. You know why? Because we weren't cynical and cold-blooded enough to put Ed's sperm in a centrifuge and spin it around to separate the X's from the Y's! Excuse me, brother, but no matter how much uncle Joe is worth, there is a line below which we will not go. Jolene? Joette? Let's go in, girls.
Stop! I've got a metal plate in my head.
You do?
No!
He seem nervous to you?
Couldn't pull a pin out of his ass with a tractor.
